## Pass Times for U.S. State Captials

```{r}
library(tidyjson)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

calls <- read_table(
  "https://people.sc.fsu.edu/~jburkardt/datasets/states/state_capitals_ll.txt",
  col_names = c("state", "lat", "long")
) |>
  mutate(
    call = glue::glue(
      "https://api.g7vrd.co.uk/v1/satellite-passes/25544/{lat}/{long}.json"
    )
  ) |>
  pull(call)

call <- "https://api.g7vrd.co.uk/v1/satellite-passes/25544/32.361538/-86.279118.json"
httr::GET(call)$content |>
  rawToChar() |>
  as.tbl_json() |>
  enter_object("passes") |>
  gather_array() |>
  spread_all() |>
  select(start) |>
  mutate(start = as_datetime(start))

```
